name: Simon
contentPre: During my time working on Hytale in 2016-2019, it was maybe to the absolute maximum 2 years away from a PC release with the legacy engine and vision. I still have videos, screenshots and old client builds to attest to that. All developers from that time that I've talked to say the same...

name: Simon
contentPre: Yeah not denying that. I'm sure he's aware...
